results.title: Effect of total cholesterol and statin therapy on mortality in ARDS patients: a secondary analysis of the SAILS and HARP-2 trials
results.text_hl: Though the original SAILS and @<m>DISEASE_Encephalitis_Herpes_Simplex</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020803 @@@HARP-2@@@ trials did not show benefit for either statin in the overall population studied, there remains interest in studying statins further in @DISEASE_Respiratory_Distress_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D012128 @@@ARDS@@@ subphenotypes, given the encouraging data for @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ in highly inflamed subjects in particular.

citations.NLM: Pienkos SM, Moore AR, Guan J, Levitt JE, Matthay MA, Baron RM, Conlon J, McAuley DF, O'Kane CM, Rogers AJ. Effect of total cholesterol and statin therapy on mortality in ARDS patients: a secondary analysis of the SAILS and HARP-2 trials Crit Care. 2023 Mar 28;27(1):126. PMID: 36978134
citations.BibTeX: @article{36978134, title={Effect of total cholesterol and statin therapy on mortality in ARDS patients: a secondary analysis of the SAILS and HARP-2 trials}, author={Pienkos SM and Moore AR and Guan J and Levitt JE and Matthay MA and Baron RM and Conlon J and McAuley DF and O'Kane CM and Rogers AJ}, journal={Crit Care}, volume={27}, number={1}, pages={126}}

results.title: Elevated ferritin, mediated by IL-18 is associated with systemic inflammation and mortality in acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS).
results.text_hl: METHODS: Baseline plasma ferritin concentrations were measured in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Respiratory_Distress_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D012128 @@@ARDS@@@ from two randomised controlled trials of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (@GENE_HMGCR @GENE_3156 @@@Hydroxymethylglutaryl-CoA Reductase@@@ Inhibition with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ in @DISEASE_Acute_Lung_Injury @DISEASE_MESH:D055371 @@@Acute Lung Injury@@@ to Reduce @DISEASE_614113 @DISEASE_OMIM:614113 @@@Pulmonary Dysfunction-2@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Encephalitis_Herpes_Simplex</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020803 @@@HARP-2@@@); discovery cohort, UK) and @DISEASE_Neuromuscular_Manifestations @DISEASE_MESH:D020879 @@@neuromuscular blockade@@@ (ROSE; validation cohort, USA).

citations.NLM: Mehta P, Samanta RJ, Wick K, Coll RC, Mawhinney T, McAleavey PG, Boyle AJ, Conlon J, Shankar-Hari M, Rogers A, Calfee CS, Matthay MA, Summers C, Chambers RC, McAuley DF, O'Kane CM. Elevated ferritin, mediated by IL-18 is associated with systemic inflammation and mortality in acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS). Thorax. 2023 Dec 26;():. PMID: 38148147
